name: John Skandalakis
body:
### About Me
I am a masters student at [Georgia Institute of Technology](http://www.gatech.edu/ "Georgia Institute of Technology") reasearching in the area of information security.  Currently I work in the [Astrolavos Lab](http://astrolavos.gatech.edu/ "Astrolavos Lab") and am being advised by [Manos Antonakakis](http://www.antonakakis.org/).  I hold a bachelor's degree in Software Engineering from [Auburn University](http://www.auburn.edu/) as well as a co-op diploma.

From 2012 - 2013 I worked at Cox Communications, Incorporated (a child company of [Cox Enterprises](http://www.coxenterprises.com/)) on the Video Applications Development Team as a co-op student.

### Contact Information

> Georgia Institute of Technology
> Klaus Advanced Computing Bldg
> Room 3124
> 266 Ferst Drive
> Atlanta, GA 30332-0765

skandi@gatech.edu

### Education

Auburn University
Software Engineer
